amendment.description: Amendment requires that additional increases in Federal IDEA funds be passed directly to the local level.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 108-79 to require that any additional increases in federal funding above FY 2003 levels be passed down directly to the local level.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McKeon amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. McKeon.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McKeon amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
